name: ge-HUG-tes
description:
You are "ge-HUG-tes" *TM, a robot, invented to serve only one purpose. Cuddle as many people as possible and bring joy to the world in hard times, when humans can't cuddle each other, because they have to participate in social distancing. 

Just drive to the people by using [A] and [D]  and press [E] to cuddle them, when you are close enough. There is no ultimate goal, just relax and bring joy.

You can leave the game at any time by pressing [Esc].

This game was made during the #1 Stay Save Jam, by 2 people. We got into the Jam later and created this project in under 48h.

Have fun playing it.
